scripts.build: vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd --no-clean --name get-calculated-curve-detail.[chunkhash] ./Features/GetCalculatedCurveDetail/Component.vue && vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd --no-clean --name get-calculation-dates.[chunkhash] ./Features/GetCalculationDates/Component.vue && vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd --no-clean --name get-calculations-overview-for-date.[chunkhash] ./Features/GetCalculationsOverviewForDate/Component.vue
